Chimera: Weapons are too sweet. I prefer to use my victims against
themselves. If I were to attack you, for example, you would not
believe all the things I can find out about your lady there (he bows
to Maxima) and tell you after. Maybe not all of that would be true,
but it doesn't matter, as long as it gets you mad. Then, when they are
too confused to even realize it, I strike at my victims. But fear not,
I will not challenge you.

>
